summary: A mod that will add a bunch of new NPCs, followers, and quests as time goes on. Currently this mod focuses on the lovable follower Buffscale McThundertail.
descriptionHtml:
M.T.NPC is a mod that aims to add a bunch of new NPCs to the dull and empty world of Skyrim. I plan on updating this mod with more and more npcs, events, possible quests, and more.

That's what's planned, so what's done? One follower. This follower is custom voiced, comments on your surroundings, tells some jokes, gives you some insight on what he's thinking, and even sings a little song now and then. This follower is Buffscale McThundertail.

This mod is going to change and will have more added to it, so it is considered a WIP.

[color=#ffff00][size=3][b][u]FEATURES[/u][/b][/size][/color]
-One custom voiced Argonian follower that will comment on his surroundings, tell jokes, sing, and more.
-A fort belonging to said Argonian follower that you can use as a player home... If you can figure out how to get back in. Hope you don't mind his other house guests.

[color=#00ff00][size=3][b][u]Meet BuffScale McThundertail
[/u][/b]
[/size][/color]The main thing in this mod right now is the follower it adds. The Argonian Buffscale McThundertail. He's an adventurer and as such he loves women, gold, and ale.  Not much else to say. You'll find this stuff out when you use him. 

[color=#ffff00]Where do I find him?
[/color]Buff is hanging out at the Bee and Barb in Riften at the moment. (Subject to change at a later date)

[color=#ff7700]The Fort
[/color][size=3]You can find Buff's fort just west of Dawnstar in the mountains. You can either walk there or fast travel using the icon that is added to your map when you install the mod.
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]Why is this marked Adult Only?
[/size][/color]I honestly don't know for sure if I should mark this Adult Only. It does contain some skimpy outfits in Buff's fort and the "house guests" in Buff's fort might not be for everyone. Don't judge the Argonian. It's all he knows. If I could take the Adult Only tick off I would, but for now I'm not risking any trouble.

[u]Installation
[/u]Download the file, unpackage it and put the contents in your Data folder. 

[size=3][u]Issues?[/u][/size]
Because I know I'm bound to have screwed something up please report any issues with the mod to me. Did I make a spelling error somewhere? Buff not following? Something else not working? Just tell me and I'll get right on that.


[u]Special Thanks
[/u]Thanks to the voice actor who helped me out with Buff: John Doe 
Thanks to Mr Casual/Buffscale McThundertail for helping me make this craziness.
author: kekechi
